text:
真挚地,
[redacted_name]
Chief Operating Officer
Greater China
如链接无效，请将以下 链接地址复制并粘贴到您的浏览器中:[redacted_url]
[redacted_name] 谨代表洲际酒店集团向您发送此封邮件。 在您向洲际酒店集团提供电子邮件地址时，曾表示您愿意接收此类邮件，这代表着您理解并愿意接受独立服务供应商与您取得联系。
trans:
Sincerely,
[redacted_name]
Chief Operating Officer
Greater China
If the link is not working, please copy and paste the following URL into your browser: [redacted_url]
[redacted_name] sends you this email on behalf of InterContinental Hotels Group. When you provided your email address to InterContinental Hotels Group, you indicated that you are willing to receive such emails, which means that you understand and agree to receive communications from independent service providers.
